# biomuts

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->


## installation

You can install the development version of `biomuts` like so:

``` r
devtools::install_github("william-swl/biomuts")
```

## utils
- correct the gaps location to fit codon frames
```{r utils-DNA_gaps_corr}
DNA_gaps_corr("AT---G")
```

- translate DNA to AA (gaps allowed)
```{r utils-dna2aa}
dna2aa("ATG---AAA")
```
